# bamazon


# Node.js & MySQL

Overview

In this activity, we created an Amazon-like storefront with the MySQL skills from this unit. The app takes in orders from customers and deplete stock from the store's inventory.  This funtionality of this program is dependant on the following npm packages: inquire, mysql, cli-table.

      <div class="body" data-article-id="35939" id="article-body" itemprop="articleBody">
        

<p>Hello world!. In this tutorial, we are going to build a simple CRUD application using Node JS and MySQL. </p>

<h2>
  <a name="what-we-will-build" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#what-we-will-build" class="anchor">
  </a>
  What we will build?
</h2>

<p><a href="./Build a simple app using Node JS and MySQL. - DEV Community üë©_üíªüë®_üíª_files/homepage2.png" class="article-body-image-wrapper"><img src="./Build a simple app using Node JS and MySQL. - DEV Community üë©_üíªüë®_üíª_files/homepage2.png" alt=""></a><br>
The image above shows the app. It is an application that lets you add players to a database and also display their details from the database. You can also delete and edit player details.</p>

<h2>
  <a name="prerequisites" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#prerequisites" class="anchor">
  </a>
  Prerequisites
</h2>

<p>Before you join this tutorial it is assumed that you meet the requirements listed below:</p>

<ul>
<li>Node JS installed on your PC. </li>
<li>Basic understanding of Node JS and Express JS.</li>
<li>Knowledge of SQL, you should know and understand how to query a database.</li>
<li>phpmyadmin installed on your PC. I recommend installing <a href="https://www.apachefriends.org/download.html">xampp</a> as it already contains phpmyadmin in it.</li>
<li>Understand how to use templating engines -- we are going to be using ejs in this tutorial).</li>
<li>A text editor or IDE of your choice.</li>
</ul>

<h2>
  <a name="folder-structure" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#folder-structure" class="anchor">
  </a>
  Folder Structure
</h2>

<p>This is how the project will be structured.</p>



<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight plaintext"><code>‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ node-mqsql-crud-app (main directory)   
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ node_modules
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ public
        ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ assets 
            ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ img
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ routes
        ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ index.js
        ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ player.js
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ views
        ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ partials 
            ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ header.ejs
        ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ index.ejs
        ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ add-player.ejs
        ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ edit-player.ejs
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ app.js    
</code></pre></div>



<h2>
  <a name="creating-the-directory-for-the-project" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#creating-the-directory-for-the-project" class="anchor">
  </a>
  Creating the directory for the project
</h2>

<p>Open the command prompt in a suitable directory and type the following command: </p>



<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight plaintext"><code>mkdir node-mysql-crud-app 
</code></pre></div>



<p>then change to the directory by typing the following command</p>



<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight plaintext"><code>cd node-mysql-crud-app 
</code></pre></div>



<h2>
  <a name="initialize-the-project" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#initialize-the-project" class="anchor">
  </a>
  Initialize the Project
</h2>

<p>Open your command prompt in your project directory and type the command below:</p>



<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight plaintext"><code>npm init
</code></pre></div>



<h2>
  <a name="install-required-modules" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#install-required-modules" class="anchor">
  </a>
  Install required modules.
</h2>

<p>The following modules are going to be needed to successfully build the app.</p>

<ul>
<li>
<strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/express">express</a></strong>: used to create handle routing and process requests from the client.</li>
<li>
<strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/express-fileupload">express-fileupload</a></strong>: Simple express file upload middleware that wraps around busboy.</li>
<li>
<strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/body-parser">body-parser</a></strong>: used to parse incoming request from the client.</li>
<li>
<strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/mysql">mysql</a></strong>: Node JS driver for MySQL.</li>
<li>
<strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/ejs">ejs</a></strong>: templating engine  to render html pages for the app.</li>
<li>
<strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/req-flash">req-flash</a></strong>: used to send flash messages to the view</li>
<li>
<strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/nodemon">nodemon</a></strong>: Installed globally. It is used to watch for changes to files and automatically restart the server.</li>
</ul>

<p>Type the following command to install the first 7 modules as dependencies.</p>



<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight plaintext"><code>npm install express express-fileupload body-parser mysql ejs req-flash --save
</code></pre></div>



<p>Then type the following command to install the last module globally on your PC.</p>



<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight plaintext"><code>npm install nodemon -g
</code></pre></div>

<span class="k">CREATE</span> <span class="k">TABLE</span> <span class="n">IF</span> <span class="k">NOT</span> <span class="k">EXISTS</span> <span class="nv">`players`</span> <span class="p">(</span>
  <span class="nv">`id`</span> <span class="n">int</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">NOT</span> <span class="k">NULL</span> <span class="n">AUTO_INCREMENT</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="nv">`first_name`</span> <span class="n">varchar</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">255</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">NOT</span> <span class="k">NULL</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="nv">`last_name`</span> <span class="n">varchar</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">255</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">NOT</span> <span class="k">NULL</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="nv">`position`</span> <span class="n">varchar</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">255</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">NOT</span> <span class="k">NULL</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="nv">`number`</span> <span class="n">int</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">11</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">NOT</span> <span class="k">NULL</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="nv">`image`</span> <span class="n">varchar</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">255</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">NOT</span> <span class="k">NULL</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="nv">`user_name`</span> <span class="n">varchar</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">NOT</span> <span class="k">NULL</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="k">PRIMARY</span> <span class="k">KEY</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nv">`id`</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="p">)</span> <span class="n">ENGINE</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">InnoDB</span>  <span class="k">DEFAULT</span> <span class="n">CHARSET</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">latin1</span> <span class="n">AUTO_INCREMENT</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">;</span>
</code></pre></div>

<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight plaintext"><code>&lt;!doctype html&gt;

<h3>
  <a name="indexejs" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#indexejs" class="anchor">
  </a>
  index.ejs
</h3>

<blockquote>
<p>This is the homepage of the app which contains a table to display a list of all the players.</p>
</blockquote>



<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight plaintext"><code>&lt;% include partials/header.ejs %&gt;
    &lt;div class="table-wrapper"&gt;
        &lt;% if (players.length &gt; 0) {%&gt;
            &lt;table class="table table-hovered"&gt;
                &lt;thead class="thead-dark"&gt;
                    &lt;tr&gt;
                        &lt;th scope="col"&gt;ID&lt;/th&gt;
                        &lt;th scope="col"&gt;Image&lt;/th&gt;
                        &lt;th scope="col"&gt;First Name&lt;/th&gt;
                        &lt;th scope="col"&gt;Last Name&lt;/th&gt;
                        &lt;th scope="col"&gt;Position&lt;/th&gt;
                        &lt;th scope="col"&gt;Number&lt;/th&gt;
                        &lt;th scope="col"&gt;Username&lt;/th&gt;
                        &lt;th scope="col"&gt;Action&lt;/th&gt;
                    &lt;/tr&gt;
                &lt;/thead&gt;
                &lt;tbody&gt;
                    &lt;% players.forEach((player, index) =&gt; { %&gt;
                        &lt;tr&gt;
                            &lt;th scope="row"&gt;&lt;%= player.id %&gt;&lt;/th&gt;
                            &lt;td&gt;&lt;img src="/assets/img/&lt;%= player.image %&gt;" class="rounded-circle player-img" alt=""&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
                            &lt;td&gt;&lt;%= player.first_name %&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
                            &lt;td&gt;&lt;%= player.last_name %&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
                            &lt;td&gt;&lt;%= player.position %&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
                            &lt;td&gt;&lt;%= player.number %&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
                            &lt;td&gt;@&lt;%= player.user_name %&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
                            &lt;td&gt;
                                &lt;a href="/edit/&lt;%= player.id %&gt;" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="btn btn-sm btn-success"&gt;Edit&lt;/a&gt;
                                &lt;a href="/delete/&lt;%= player.id %&gt;" class="btn btn-sm btn-danger"&gt;Delete&lt;/a&gt;
                            &lt;/td&gt;
                        &lt;/tr&gt;
                    &lt;% }) %&gt;
                &lt;/tbody&gt;
            &lt;/table&gt;
        &lt;% } else { %&gt;
            &lt;p class="text-center"&gt;No players found. Go &lt;a href="/add" &gt;here&lt;/a&gt; to add players.&lt;/p&gt;
        &lt;% } %&gt;
    &lt;/div&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;/body&gt;
&lt;/html&gt;

</code></pre></div>



<h3>
  <a name="addplayerejs" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#addplayerejs" class="anchor">
  </a>
  add-player.ejs
</h3>

<blockquote>
<p>This page contains the form to add a new player to the database.</p>
</blockquote>



<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight plaintext"><code>&lt;% include partials/header.ejs %&gt;
    &lt;div class="container"&gt;
        &lt;% if (message != '') { %&gt;
            &lt;p class="text-center text-danger"&gt;&lt;%= message %&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
        &lt;% } %&gt;
        &lt;form class="add-player-form" action="" method="post" enctype="multipart/form-data"&gt;
            &lt;div class="form-row"&gt;
                &lt;div class="form-group col-md-4"&gt;
                    &lt;input type="text" class="form-control" name="first_name" id="first-name" placeholder="First Name" required&gt;
                &lt;/div&gt;
                &lt;div class="form-group col-md-4"&gt;
                    &lt;input type="text" class="form-control" name="last_name" id="last-name" placeholder="Last Name" required&gt;
                &lt;/div&gt;
                &lt;div class="form-group col-md-4"&gt;
                    &lt;input type="text" class="form-control" name="username" id="username" placeholder="Username" required&gt;
                &lt;/div&gt;
            &lt;/div&gt;
            &lt;div class="form-row"&gt;
                &lt;div class="form-group col-md-6"&gt;
                    &lt;input type="number" class="form-control" name="number" id="number" placeholder="Number" required&gt;
                &lt;/div&gt;
                &lt;div class="form-group col-md-6"&gt;
                    &lt;select id="position" name="position" class="form-control" required&gt;
                        &lt;option selected disabled&gt;Choose position&lt;/option&gt;
                        &lt;option&gt;Goalkeeper&lt;/option&gt;
                        &lt;option&gt;Defender&lt;/option&gt;
                        &lt;option&gt;Midfielder&lt;/option&gt;
                        &lt;option&gt;Forward&lt;/option&gt;
                    &lt;/select&gt;
                &lt;/div&gt;
                &lt;div class="col-md-12"&gt;
                    &lt;label for="player-img"&gt;&lt;b&gt;Player Image&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/label&gt;&lt;br&gt;
                    &lt;input type="file" name="image" id="player-img" class="" required&gt;
                &lt;/div&gt;
            &lt;/div&gt;
            &lt;button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary float-right"&gt;Add Player&lt;/button&gt;
        &lt;/form&gt;
    &lt;/div&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;/body&gt;
&lt;/html&gt;

</code></pre></div>



<h3>
  <a name="editplayerejs" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#editplayerejs" class="anchor">

  edit-player.ejs

<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight plaintext"><code>&lt;% include partials/header.ejs %&gt;
&lt;div class="container"&gt;
    &lt;% if (message) { %&gt;
        &lt;p class="text-center text-danger"&gt;&lt;%= message %&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
    &lt;% } %&gt;

    &lt;% if (player) { %&gt;
        &lt;form class="add-player-form" action="" method="post" enctype="multipart/form-data"&gt;
            &lt;div class="form-row"&gt;
                &lt;div class="form-group col-md-4"&gt;
                    &lt;label for="first-name"&gt;First Name&lt;/label&gt;
                    &lt;input type="text" class="form-control" name="first_name" id="first-name" value="&lt;%= player.first_name %&gt;" required&gt;
                &lt;/div&gt;
                &lt;div class="form-group col-md-4"&gt;
                    &lt;label for="last-name"&gt;Last Name&lt;/label&gt;
                    &lt;input type="text" class="form-control" name="last_name" id="last-name" value="&lt;%= player.last_name %&gt;" required&gt;
                &lt;/div&gt;
                &lt;div class="form-group col-md-4"&gt;
                    &lt;label for="username"&gt;Username&lt;/label&gt;
                    &lt;input type="text" class="form-control" name="username" id="username" value="&lt;%= player.user_name %&gt;" required disabled title="Username cannot be edited."&gt;
                &lt;/div&gt;
            &lt;/div&gt;
            &lt;div class="form-row"&gt;
                &lt;div class="form-group col-md-6"&gt;
                    &lt;label for="number"&gt;Number&lt;/label&gt;
                    &lt;input type="number" class="form-control" name="number" id="number" placeholder="Number" value="&lt;%= player.number %&gt;" required&gt;
                &lt;/div&gt;
                &lt;div class="form-group col-md-6"&gt;
                    &lt;label for="position"&gt;Position&lt;/label&gt;
                    &lt;select id="position" name="position" class="form-control" required&gt;
                        &lt;option selected&gt;&lt;%= player.position %&gt;&lt;/option&gt;
                        &lt;option&gt;Goalkeeper&lt;/option&gt;
                        &lt;option&gt;Centre Back&lt;/option&gt;
                        &lt;option&gt;Right Back&lt;/option&gt;
                        &lt;option&gt;Left Back&lt;/option&gt;
                        &lt;option&gt;Defensive Midfielder&lt;/option&gt;
                        &lt;option&gt;Central Midfielder&lt;/option&gt;
                        &lt;option&gt;Attacking Midfielder&lt;/option&gt;
                        &lt;option&gt;Right Wing Forward&lt;/option&gt;
                        &lt;option&gt;Left Wing Forward&lt;/option&gt;
                        &lt;option&gt;Striker&lt;/option&gt;
                    &lt;/select&gt;
                &lt;/div&gt;
            &lt;/div&gt;
            &lt;button type="submit" class="btn btn-success float-right"&gt;Update Player&lt;/button&gt;
        &lt;/form&gt;
    &lt;% } else { %&gt;
        &lt;p class="text-center"&gt;Player Not Found. Go &lt;a href="/add"&gt;here&lt;/a&gt; to add players.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;

&lt;/html&gt;

<h2>
  <a name="working-on-the-server" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#working-on-the-server" class="anchor">
  </a>
  Working on the server.
</h2>

<h3>
  <a name="appjs" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#appjs" class="anchor">
  </a>
  App.js
</h3>



<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight javascript"><code><span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">express</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">require</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'express'</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">fileUpload</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">require</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'express-fileupload'</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">bodyParser</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">require</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'body-parser'</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">mysql</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">require</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'mysql'</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">path</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">require</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'path'</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">app</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">express</span><span class="p">();</span>

<span class="c1">// const {getHomePage} = require('./routes/index');</span>
<span class="c1">// const {addPlayerPage, addPlayer, deletePlayer, editPlayer, editPlayerPage} = require('./routes/player');</span>
<span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">port</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">5000</span><span class="p">;</span>

<span class="c1">// create connection to database</span>
<span class="c1">// the mysql.createConnection function takes in a configuration object which contains host, user, password and the database name.</span>
<span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">db</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">mysql</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">createConnection</span> <span class="p">({</span>
    <span class="na">host</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'localhost'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="na">user</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'root'</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="na">password</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">''</span><span class="p">,</span>
    <span class="na">database</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'socka'</span>
<span class="p">});</span>

<span class="c1">// connect to database</span>
<span class="nx">db</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">connect</span><span class="p">((</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="k">throw</span> <span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">;</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>
    <span class="nx">console</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Connected to database'</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="p">});</span>
<span class="nb">global</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">db</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">db</span><span class="p">;</span>

<span class="c1">// configure middleware</span>
<span class="nx">app</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="kd">set</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'port'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">process</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">env</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">port</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="nx">port</span><span class="p">);</span> <span class="c1">// set express to use this port</span>
<span class="nx">app</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="kd">set</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'views'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">__dirname</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s1">'/views'</span><span class="p">);</span> <span class="c1">// set express to look in this folder to render our view</span>
<span class="nx">app</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="kd">set</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'view engine'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'ejs'</span><span class="p">);</span> <span class="c1">// configure template engine</span>
<span class="nx">app</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">use</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">bodyParser</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">urlencoded</span><span class="p">({</span> <span class="na">extended</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="kc">false</span> <span class="p">}));</span>
<span class="nx">app</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">use</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">bodyParser</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">json</span><span class="p">());</span> <span class="c1">// parse form data client</span>
<span class="nx">app</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">use</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">express</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="kr">static</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">path</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">join</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">__dirname</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'public'</span><span class="p">)));</span> <span class="c1">// configure express to use public folder</span>
<span class="nx">app</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">use</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">fileUpload</span><span class="p">());</span> <span class="c1">// configure fileupload</span>

<span class="c1">// routes for the app</span>
<span class="cm">/*
app.get('/', getHomePage);
app.get('/add', addPlayerPage);
app.get('/edit/:id', editPlayerPage);
app.get('/delete/:id', deletePlayer);
app.post('/add', addPlayer);
app.post('/edit/:id', editPlayer);
*/</span>

<span class="c1">// set the app to listen on the port</span>
<span class="nx">app</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">listen</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">port</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="nx">console</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">log</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`Server running on port: </span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">port</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">);</span>
<span class="p">});</span>

</code></pre></div>



<blockquote>
<p>In the above code, the modules are required and then a connection to the database is created. The <strong>mysql.createConnection</strong> function takes in an object which contains the configuration of the database being connected to. In the next statement, the database is being connected. Run the code below on the command prompt to run the server.</p>
</blockquote>



<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight plaintext"><code>nodemon app.js
</code></pre></div>

<h2>
  <a name="adding-the-routes" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#adding-the-routes" class="anchor">
  </a>
  Adding the routes
</h2>

<h3>
  <a name="indexjs" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#indexjs" class="anchor">
  </a>
  index.js
</h3>

<p>Copy the code below into the index.js file in the <em><strong>/routes</strong></em> directory.</p>



<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight javascript"><code><span class="nx">module</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">exports</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="na">getHomePage</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">req</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">query</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"SELECT * FROM `players` ORDER BY id ASC"</span><span class="p">;</span> <span class="c1">// query database to get all the players</span>

        <span class="c1">// execute query</span>
        <span class="nx">db</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">query</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">query</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">result</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
            <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
                <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">redirect</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'/'</span><span class="p">);</span>
            <span class="p">}</span>
            <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">render</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'index.ejs'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">{</span>
                <span class="na">title</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Welcome</span> <span class="nx">to</span> <span class="nx">Socka</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="nx">View</span> <span class="nx">Players</span>
                <span class="p">,</span><span class="na">players</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">result</span>
            <span class="p">});</span>
        <span class="p">});</span>
    <span class="p">},</span>
<span class="p">};</span>

</code></pre></div>



<blockquote>
<p>The <strong>db.query</strong> function queries the database. It takes in the query and string and a callback which takes in two parameters, if the query is successful, the result is passed to the view in the <strong><em>res.render</em></strong> function. </p>
</blockquote>

<h3>
  <a name="playerjs" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#playerjs" class="anchor">
  </a>
  player.js
</h3>

<p>The <strong>player.js</strong> file is going to contain all the routes for the players page such as adding a player, updating a player's details and deleting a player. </p>



<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight javascript"><code><span class="kd">const</span> <span class="nx">fs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">require</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'fs'</span><span class="p">);</span>

<span class="nx">module</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">exports</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
    <span class="na">addPlayerPage</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">req</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">render</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'add-player.ejs'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">{</span>
            <span class="na">title</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Welcome</span> <span class="nx">to</span> <span class="nx">Socka</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="nx">Add</span> <span class="nx">a</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nx">player</span>
            <span class="p">,</span><span class="na">message</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">''</span>
        <span class="p">});</span>
    <span class="p">},</span>
    <span class="na">addPlayer</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">req</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="nx">req</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">files</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
            <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">status</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">400</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nx">send</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"No files were uploaded."</span><span class="p">);</span>
        <span class="p">}</span>

        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">message</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">''</span><span class="p">;</span>
        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">first_name</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">req</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">body</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">first_name</span><span class="p">;</span>
        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">last_name</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">req</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">body</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">last_name</span><span class="p">;</span>
        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">position</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">req</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">body</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">position</span><span class="p">;</span>
        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">number</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">req</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">body</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">number</span><span class="p">;</span>
        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">username</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">req</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">body</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">username</span><span class="p">;</span>
        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">uploadedFile</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">req</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">files</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">image</span><span class="p">;</span>
        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">image_name</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">uploadedFile</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">name</span><span class="p">;</span>
        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">fileExtension</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">uploadedFile</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">mimetype</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'/'</span><span class="p">)[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">];</span>
        <span class="nx">image_name</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">username</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s1">'.'</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">fileExtension</span><span class="p">;</span>

        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">usernameQuery</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"SELECT * FROM `players` WHERE user_name = '"</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">username</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">"'"</span><span class="p">;</span>

        <span class="nx">db</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">query</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">usernameQuery</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">result</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
            <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
                <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">status</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">500</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nx">send</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">);</span>
            <span class="p">}</span>
            <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">result</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">length</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
                <span class="nx">message</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Username already exists'</span><span class="p">;</span>
                <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">render</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'add-player.ejs'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">{</span>
                    <span class="nx">message</span><span class="p">,</span>
                    <span class="na">title</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Welcome</span> <span class="nx">to</span> <span class="nx">Socka</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="nx">Add</span> <span class="nx">a</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nx">player</span>
                <span class="p">});</span>
            <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="p">{</span>
                <span class="c1">// check the filetype before uploading it</span>
                <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">uploadedFile</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">mimetype</span> <span class="o">===</span> <span class="s1">'image/png'</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="nx">uploadedFile</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">mimetype</span> <span class="o">===</span> <span class="s1">'image/jpeg'</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="nx">uploadedFile</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">mimetype</span> <span class="o">===</span> <span class="s1">'image/gif'</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
                    <span class="c1">// upload the file to the /public/assets/img directory</span>
                    <span class="nx">uploadedFile</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">mv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`public/assets/img/</span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">image_name</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span> <span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
                        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
                            <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">status</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">500</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nx">send</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">);</span>
                        <span class="p">}</span>
                        <span class="c1">// send the player's details to the database</span>
                        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">query</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"INSERT INTO `players` (first_name, last_name, position, number, image, user_name) VALUES ('"</span> <span class="o">+</span>
                            <span class="nx">first_name</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">"', '"</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">last_name</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">"', '"</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">position</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">"', '"</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">number</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">"', '"</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">image_name</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">"', '"</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">username</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">"')"</span><span class="p">;</span>
                        <span class="nx">db</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">query</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">query</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">result</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
                            <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
                                <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">status</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">500</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nx">send</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">);</span>
                            <span class="p">}</span>
                            <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">redirect</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'/'</span><span class="p">);</span>
                        <span class="p">});</span>
                    <span class="p">});</span>
                <span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="p">{</span>
                    <span class="nx">message</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"Invalid File format. Only 'gif', 'jpeg' and 'png' images are allowed."</span><span class="p">;</span>
                    <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">render</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'add-player.ejs'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">{</span>
                        <span class="nx">message</span><span class="p">,</span>
                        <span class="na">title</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Welcome</span> <span class="nx">to</span> <span class="nx">Socka</span> <span class="o">|</span> <span class="nx">Add</span> <span class="nx">a</span> <span class="k">new</span> <span class="nx">player</span>
                    <span class="p">});</span>
                <span class="p">}</span>
            <span class="p">}</span>
        <span class="p">});</span>
    <span class="p">},</span>
    <span class="na">editPlayerPage</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">req</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">playerId</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">req</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">params</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">id</span><span class="p">;</span>
        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">query</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"SELECT * FROM `players` WHERE id = '"</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">playerId</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">"' "</span><span class="p">;</span>
        <span class="nx">db</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">query</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">query</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">result</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
            <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
                <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">status</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">500</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nx">send</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">);</span>
            <span class="p">}</span>
            <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">render</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'edit-player.ejs'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">{</span>
                <span class="na">title</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Edit</span>  <span class="nx">Player</span>
                <span class="p">,</span><span class="na">player</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span>
                <span class="p">,</span><span class="na">message</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">''</span>
            <span class="p">});</span>
        <span class="p">});</span>
    <span class="p">},</span>
    <span class="na">editPlayer</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">req</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">playerId</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">req</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">params</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">id</span><span class="p">;</span>
        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">first_name</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">req</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">body</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">first_name</span><span class="p">;</span>
        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">last_name</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">req</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">body</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">last_name</span><span class="p">;</span>
        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">position</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">req</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">body</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">position</span><span class="p">;</span>
        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">number</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">req</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">body</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">number</span><span class="p">;</span>

        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">query</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"UPDATE `players` SET `first_name` = '"</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">first_name</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">"', `last_name` = '"</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">last_name</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">"', `position` = '"</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">position</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">"', `number` = '"</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">number</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">"' WHERE `players`.`id` = '"</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">playerId</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">"'"</span><span class="p">;</span>
        <span class="nx">db</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">query</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">query</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">result</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
            <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
                <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">status</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">500</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nx">send</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">);</span>
            <span class="p">}</span>
            <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">redirect</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'/'</span><span class="p">);</span>
        <span class="p">});</span>
    <span class="p">},</span>
    <span class="na">deletePlayer</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">req</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">playerId</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">req</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">params</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">id</span><span class="p">;</span>
        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">getImageQuery</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'SELECT image from `players` WHERE id = "'</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">playerId</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s1">'"'</span><span class="p">;</span>
        <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">deleteUserQuery</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'DELETE FROM players WHERE id = "'</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">playerId</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s1">'"'</span><span class="p">;</span>

        <span class="nx">db</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">query</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">getImageQuery</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">result</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
            <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
                <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">status</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">500</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nx">send</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">);</span>
            <span class="p">}</span>

            <span class="kd">let</span> <span class="nx">image</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">].</span><span class="nx">image</span><span class="p">;</span>

            <span class="nx">fs</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">unlink</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">`public/assets/img/</span><span class="p">${</span><span class="nx">image</span><span class="p">}</span><span class="s2">`</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
                <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
                    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">status</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">500</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nx">send</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">);</span>
                <span class="p">}</span>
                <span class="nx">db</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">query</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">deleteUserQuery</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">result</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=&gt;</span> <span class="p">{</span>
                    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
                        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">status</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">500</span><span class="p">).</span><span class="nx">send</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">err</span><span class="p">);</span>
                    <span class="p">}</span>
                    <span class="nx">res</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">redirect</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'/'</span><span class="p">);</span>
                <span class="p">});</span>
            <span class="p">});</span>
        <span class="p">});</span>
    <span class="p">}</span>
<span class="p">};</span>

</code></pre></div>



<blockquote>
<p>This file handles all the post and get requests for the players page. The add player function contains a function that uploads the player's image to the <em><strong>/public/assets/img</strong></em> directory and sends the player's details to the database.</p>
</blockquote>

<h2>
  <a name="connecting-the-routes-and-the-views" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#connecting-the-routes-and-the-views" class="anchor">
  </a>
  Connecting the routes and the views
</h2>

<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight plaintext"><code>/*

<h2>
  <a name="running-the-app" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#running-the-app" class="anchor">
  </a>
  Running the app
</h2>

<p>After removing the commented lines, check your command prompt to ensure your code has no errors, then head over to your browser and open <a href="http://localhost:5000/">http://localhost:5000</a>. The index page will be shown and since no players have been added, the page will look similar to the one below:</p>

<p><a href="./Build a simple app using Node JS and MySQL. - DEV Community üë©_üíªüë®_üíª_files/homepage.png" class="article-body-image-wrapper"><img src="./Build a simple app using Node JS and MySQL. - DEV Community üë©_üíªüë®_üíª_files/homepage.png" alt=""></a></p>

<p>Click the <strong>Add a player</strong> link on the page, the add player page will load and then fill the form to add a player. After adding a player the home page will display the players added in a table. Like this </p>

<p><a href="./Build a simple app using Node JS and MySQL. - DEV Community üë©_üíªüë®_üíª_files/homepage2(1).png" class="article-body-image-wrapper"><img src="./Build a simple app using Node JS and MySQL. - DEV Community üë©_üíªüë®_üíª_files/homepage2(1).png" alt=""></a></p>

<p>If errors are encountered, draw my attention in the comment section or check the repo of the project on <a href="https://github.com/achowba/node-mysql-crud-app">github</a>.<br>
The code is not perfect and please feel free to make it better and send a pull request.</p>

<p>Don't forget to check me out on <a href="https://twitter.com/achowba_">twitter</a> or <a href="https://github.com/achowba">github</a>.</p>

      if (document.head.querySelector(
    'meta[name="user-signed-in"][content="true"]',
  )) {

    function displayPollResults(json) {
      var totalVotes = json.voting_data.votes_count;
      json.voting_data.votes_distribution.forEach(function(point) {
        var pollOptionItem = document.getElementById('poll_option_list_item_'+point[0]);
        var optionText = document.getElementById('poll_option_label_'+point[0]).textContent;
        if (json.user_vote_poll_option_id === point[0]) {
          var votedClass = 'optionvotedfor'
        } else {
          var votedClass = 'optionnotvotedfor'
        }
        if (totalVotes === 0) {
          var percent = 0;
        } else {
          var percent = (point[1]/totalVotes)*100;
        }
        var roundedPercent = Math.round( percent * 10 ) / 10
        var percentFromRight = (100-roundedPercent)
        var html = '<span><span class="ltag-votepercent ltag-'+votedClass+'" style="right:'+percentFromRight+'%"></span>          <span class="ltag-votepercenttext">'+optionText+' ‚Äî '+roundedPercent+'%</span></span>';
        pollOptionItem.innerHTML = html;
        pollOptionItem.classList.add('already-voted')
        document.getElementById('showmethemoney-'+json.poll_id).innerHTML = '<span class="ltag-voting-results-count">'+totalVotes+' total votes</span>';
      })
    }

    var polls = document.getElementsByClassName('ltag-poll');
    for (i = 0; i < polls.length; i += 1) {
      var poll = polls[i]
      var pollId = poll.dataset.pollId
      window.fetch('/poll_votes/'+pollId)
      .then(function(response){
        response.json().then(
          function(json){
            if (json.voted) {
              displayPollResults(json)
            } else {
              var els = document.getElementById('poll_'+json.poll_id).getElementsByClassName('ltag-polloption')
              for (i = 0; i < els.length; i += 1) {
                els[i].addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                  var tokenMeta = document.querySelector("meta[name='csrf-token']")
                  if (!tokenMeta) {
                    alert('Whoops. There was an error. Your vote was not counted. Try refreshing the page.')
                    return
                  }
                  var csrfToken = tokenMeta.getAttribute('content')
                  var optionId = e.target.dataset.optionId
                  window.fetch('/poll_votes', {
                    method: 'POST',
                    headers: {
                      'X-CSRF-Token': csrfToken,
                      'Content-Type': 'application/json',
                    },
                    body: JSON.stringify({poll_vote: { poll_option_id: optionId } }),
                    credentials: 'same-origin',
                  }).then(function(response){
                    response.json().then(function(j){displayPollResults(j)})
                  })
                });
              }
              document.getElementById('showmethemoney-'+json.poll_id).addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                pollId = this.dataset.pollId
                window.fetch('/poll_skips', {
                  method: 'POST',
                  headers: {
                    'X-CSRF-Token': csrfToken,
                    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
                  },
                  body: JSON.stringify({poll_skip: {poll_id: pollId }}),
                  credentials: 'same-origin',
                }).then(function(response){
                  response.json().then(function(j){displayPollResults(j)})
                })
              });
            }
          }
        )
      })
    }
  } else {
    var els = document.getElementsByClassName('ltag-poll')
    for (i = 0; i < els.length; i += 1) {
      els[i].onclick = function(e) {
        if (typeof showModal !== "undefined") {
          showModal('poll');
        }
      }
    }
}

      <div class="body" data-article-id="35939" id="article-body" itemprop="articleBody">
        

<p>Hello world!. In this tutorial, we are going to build a simple CRUD application using Node JS and MySQL. </p>

<h2>
  <a name="what-we-will-build" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#what-we-will-build" class="anchor">
  </a>
  What we will build?
</h2>

<p><a href="./Build a simple app using Node JS and MySQL. - DEV Community üë©_üíªüë®_üíª_files/homepage2.png" class="article-body-image-wrapper"><img src="./Build a simple app using Node JS and MySQL. - DEV Community üë©_üíªüë®_üíª_files/homepage2.png" alt=""></a><br>
The image above shows the app. It is an application that lets you add players to a database and also display their details from the database. You can also delete and edit player details.</p>

<h2>
  <a name="prerequisites" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#prerequisites" class="anchor">
  </a>
  Prerequisites
</h2>

<p>Before you join this tutorial it is assumed that you meet the requirements listed below:</p>

<ul>
<li>Node JS installed on your PC. </li>
<li>Basic understanding of Node JS and Express JS.</li>
<li>Knowledge of SQL, you should know and understand how to query a database.</li>
<li>phpmyadmin installed on your PC. I recommend installing <a href="https://www.apachefriends.org/download.html">xampp</a> as it already contains phpmyadmin in it.</li>
<li>Understand how to use templating engines -- we are going to be using ejs in this tutorial).</li>
<li>A text editor or IDE of your choice.</li>
</ul>

<h2>
  <a name="folder-structure" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#folder-structure" class="anchor">
  </a>
  Folder Structure
</h2>

<p>This is how the project will be structured.</p>



<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight plaintext"><code>‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ node-mqsql-crud-app (main directory)   
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ node_modules
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ public
        ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ assets 
            ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ img
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ routes
        ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ index.js
        ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ player.js
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ views
        ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ partials 
            ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ header.ejs
        ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ index.ejs
        ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ add-player.ejs
        ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ edit-player.ejs
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ app.js    
</code></pre></div>



<h2>
  <a name="creating-the-directory-for-the-project" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#creating-the-directory-for-the-project" class="anchor">
  </a>
  Creating the directory for the project
</h2>

<p>Open the command prompt in a suitable directory and type the following command: </p>



<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight plaintext"><code>mkdir node-mysql-crud-app 
</code></pre></div>



<p>then change to the directory by typing the following command</p>



<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight plaintext"><code>cd node-mysql-crud-app 
</code></pre></div>



<h2>
  <a name="initialize-the-project" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#initialize-the-project" class="anchor">
  </a>
  Initialize the Project
</h2>

<p>Open your command prompt in your project directory and type the command below:</p>



<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight plaintext"><code>npm init
</code></pre></div>



<h2>
  <a name="install-required-modules" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#install-required-modules" class="anchor">
  </a>
  Install required modules.
</h2>

<p>The following modules are going to be needed to successfully build the app.</p>

<ul>
<li>
<strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/express">express</a></strong>: used to create handle routing and process requests from the client.</li>
<li>
<strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/express-fileupload">express-fileupload</a></strong>: Simple express file upload middleware that wraps around busboy.</li>
<li>
<strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/body-parser">body-parser</a></strong>: used to parse incoming request from the client.</li>
<li>
<strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/mysql">mysql</a></strong>: Node JS driver for MySQL.</li>
<li>
<strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/ejs">ejs</a></strong>: templating engine  to render html pages for the app.</li>
<li>
<strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/req-flash">req-flash</a></strong>: used to send flash messages to the view</li>
<li>
<strong><a href="https://www.npmjs.com/package/nodemon">nodemon</a></strong>: Installed globally. It is used to watch for changes to files and automatically restart the server.</li>
</ul>

<p>Type the following command to install the first 7 modules as dependencies.</p>



<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight plaintext"><code>npm install express express-fileupload body-parser mysql ejs req-flash --save
</code></pre></div>



<p>Then type the following command to install the last module globally on your PC.</p>



<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight plaintext"><code>npm install nodemon -g
</code></pre></div>



<h2>
  <a name="creating-the-database-for-the-app" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#creating-the-database-for-the-app" class="anchor">
  </a>
  Creating the database for the app
</h2>

<p>Copy the command below and navigate to your phpmyadmin dashboard and execute the following query in the console (usually found at the bottom of the page) in order to create database and table for the app.</p>



<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight sql"><code><span class="k">CREATE</span> <span class="k">DATABASE</span> <span class="n">socka</span><span class="p">;</span>
<span class="k">CREATE</span> <span class="k">TABLE</span> <span class="n">IF</span> <span class="k">NOT</span> <span class="k">EXISTS</span> <span class="nv">`players`</span> <span class="p">(</span>
  <span class="nv">`id`</span> <span class="n">int</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">NOT</span> <span class="k">NULL</span> <span class="n">AUTO_INCREMENT</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="nv">`first_name`</span> <span class="n">varchar</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">255</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">NOT</span> <span class="k">NULL</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="nv">`last_name`</span> <span class="n">varchar</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">255</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">NOT</span> <span class="k">NULL</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="nv">`position`</span> <span class="n">varchar</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">255</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">NOT</span> <span class="k">NULL</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="nv">`number`</span> <span class="n">int</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">11</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">NOT</span> <span class="k">NULL</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="nv">`image`</span> <span class="n">varchar</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">255</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">NOT</span> <span class="k">NULL</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="nv">`user_name`</span> <span class="n">varchar</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">NOT</span> <span class="k">NULL</span><span class="p">,</span>
  <span class="k">PRIMARY</span> <span class="k">KEY</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nv">`id`</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="p">)</span> <span class="n">ENGINE</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">InnoDB</span>  <span class="k">DEFAULT</span> <span class="n">CHARSET</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">latin1</span> <span class="n">AUTO_INCREMENT</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">;</span>
</code></pre></div>



<h2>
  <a name="adding-the-views" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#adding-the-views" class="anchor">
  </a>
  Adding the views
</h2>

<h3>
  <a name="headerejs" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#headerejs" class="anchor">
  </a>
  header.ejs
</h3>

<p>The <strong>header.ejs</strong> file is going to be in the <em><strong>/views/partials</strong></em> folder where it is going to be included in the rest of the project.</p>



<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight plaintext"><code>&lt;!doctype html&gt;
&lt;html lang="en"&gt;
&lt;head&gt;
    &lt;meta charset="UTF-8"&gt;
    &lt;meta name="viewport"
          content="width=device-width, user-scalable=no, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0"&gt;
    &lt;meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge"&gt;
    &lt;link rel="stylesheet" href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.0.0/css/bootstrap.min.css" integrity="sha384-Gn5384xqQ1aoWXA+058RXPxPg6fy4IWvTNh0E263XmFcJlSAwiGgFAW/dAiS6JXm" crossorigin="anonymous"&gt;
    &lt;!--&lt;link rel="stylesheet" href="/assets/css/custom.css"&gt;--&gt;
    &lt;title&gt;&lt;%= title %&gt;&lt;/title&gt;
&lt;/head&gt;
&lt;style&gt;
    .table-wrapper {
        margin-top: 50px;
    }

    .player-img {
        width: 40px;
        height: 40px;
    }

    .add-player-form {
        margin-top: 50px;
    }
&lt;/style&gt;
&lt;body&gt;
&lt;div class="page-wrapper"&gt;
    &lt;nav class="navbar navbar-light bg-light"&gt;
        &lt;span class="navbar-brand mb-0 h1" &gt;&lt;a href="/"&gt;Socka Players&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt;
        &lt;a class="float-right" href="/add" title="Add a New Player"&gt;Add a Player&lt;/a&gt;
    &lt;/nav&gt;
</code></pre></div>



<h3>
  <a name="indexejs" href="https://dev.to/achowba/build-a-simple-app-using-node-js-and-mysql-19me#indexejs" class="anchor">
  </a>
  index.ejs
</h3>

<blockquote>
<p>This is the homepage of the app which contains a table to display a list of all the players.</p>
</blockquote>



<div class="highlight"><pre class="highlight plaintext"><code>&lt;% include partials/header.ejs %&gt;
    &lt;div class="table-wrapper"&gt;
        &lt;% if (players.length &gt; 0) {%&gt;
            &lt;table class="table table-hovered"&gt;
                &lt;thead class="thead-dark"&gt;
                    &lt;tr&gt;
                        &lt;th scope="col"&gt;ID&lt;/th&gt;
                        &lt;th scope="col"&gt;Image&lt;/th&gt;
                        &lt;th scope="col"&gt;First Name&lt;/th&gt;
                        &lt;th scope="col"&gt;Last Name&lt;/th&gt;
                        &lt;th scope="col"&gt;Position&lt;/th&gt;
                        &lt;th scope="col"&gt;Number&lt;/th&gt;
                        &lt;th scope="col"&gt;Username&lt;/th&gt;
                        &lt;th scope="col"&gt;Action&lt;/th&gt;
                    &lt;/tr&gt;
                &lt;/thead&gt;
                &lt;tbody&gt;
                    &lt;% players.forEach((player, index) =&gt; { %&gt;
                        &lt;tr&gt;
                            &lt;th scope="row"&gt;&lt;%= player.id %&gt;&lt;/th&gt;
                            &lt;td&gt;&lt;img src="/assets/img/&lt;%= player.image %&gt;" class="rounded-circle player-img" alt=""&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
                            &lt;td&gt;&lt;%= player.first_name %&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
                            &lt;td&gt;&lt;%= player.last_name %&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
                            &lt;td&gt;&lt;%= player.position %&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
                            &lt;td&gt;&lt;%= player.number %&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
                            &lt;td&gt;@&lt;%= player.user_name %&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
                            &lt;td&gt;
                                &lt;a href="/edit/&lt;%= player.id %&gt;" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="btn btn-sm btn-success"&gt;Edit&lt;/a&gt;
                                &lt;a href="/delete/&lt;%= player.id %&gt;" class="btn btn-sm btn-danger"&gt;Delete&lt;/a&gt;
                            &lt;/td&gt;
                        &lt;/tr&gt;
                    &lt;% }) %&gt;
                &lt;/tbody&gt;
            &lt;/table&gt;
        &lt;% } else { %&gt;
            &lt;p class="text-center"&gt;No players found. Go &lt;a href="/add" &gt;here&lt;/a&gt; to add players.&lt;/p&gt;
        &lt;% } %&gt;
    &lt;/div&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;/body&gt;
&lt;/html&gt;

</code></pre></div>

&lt;div class="container"&gt;

                &lt;/div&gt;
                &lt;div class="form-group col-md-6"&gt;
